articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Shares Have Tepid Start Before US Jobs Data: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian equities edged down as talks between President Donald Trump and Xi Jinping failed to boost sentiment and investors stayed on the sidelines ahead of the US jobs data.
articles.content:
Asian equities edged down as talks between President Donald Trump and Xi Jinping failed to boost sentiment and investors stayed on the sidelines ahead of the US jobs data.
